en: Peppa and George are visiting Granny Pig and Grandpa Pig.
zh: 佩奇和乔治去看猪奶奶和猪爷爷。

en: Before you come in the house, you must take off your muddy boots.
zh: 在你们进屋前，你们必须把靴子脱掉。

en: Peppa, George,look what I've made! Little curtains!
zh: 佩奇，乔治，看我做了什么！小窗帘！

en: What are the little curtains for, Granny?
zh: 这小窗帘是用来干什么的，奶奶？

en: Do you want to see what Grandpa Pig has made for you, in the garden?
zh: 你们想看看猪爷爷在花园为你们做了什么吗？

en: Look what I've made for you.
zh: 看看我给你们做了什么。

en: A tree house! For George and me?
zh: 树屋！是做给乔治和我的吗？

en: And the little curtains are for your tree house!
zh: 这个小窗帘是给你们的树屋做的！

en: Peppa and George love their tree house!
zh: 佩奇和乔治很喜欢他们的树屋！

en: Who wants to go inside first?
Before I go in my tree house, I must take off my muddy boots!
zh: 在进入我的树屋前，我得把我有泥巴的靴子脱掉。

en: George? Would you like to go in the tree house, too?
A young pig named "George" would like to pay a visit.
zh: 有一个叫“乔治”的小猪想来拜访你。

en: As long as he takes off his muddy boots.
zh: 只要他脱掉他有泥巴的靴子就可以。

en: George, take your boots off,then you can visit Peppa in the tree house.
zh: 乔治，把你的靴子脱掉然后你就可以进佩奇的树屋玩了。

en: Have you room for any more visitors?
zh: 你的树屋还能让人进吗？

en: Hmmmm. You have to say the secret words.
Then you can come into our house.
I see. And what are the secret words?
zh: 我明白了。那秘密暗号是什么？

en: I have to whisper them to you.
The secret words are "Daddy's Big Tummy!”
zh: 秘密暗号是“爸爸的大肚子”！

en: I think those are silly secret words.
zh: 我觉得这个暗号有点傻。

en: Mummy, before you come in our house,you must take off your boots.
zh: 妈妈，在你进我们屋前，你必须脱掉你的靴子。

en: Can I have different secret words, please?
zh: 我可以说不一样的秘密暗号吗？

en: You can come in now, Daddy!
zh: 你现在可以进来了，爸爸！

en: Er. I don't think I can fit through the door.
zh: 呃。我想我可能进不了这扇门。

en: That's because your tummy is too big!
zh: 那是因为你的肚子太大了！

en: I know! Daddy Pig can climb in through the top!
zh: 我知道了！猪爸爸可以从屋顶上爬进去！

en: Peppa, George, Mummy Pig and Daddy Pig are all in the tree house!
zh: 佩奇，乔治，猪妈妈和猪爸爸全都进了树屋里！

en: Granny, I love our tree house!
zh: 奶奶，我喜欢我们的树屋！

en: I don't want to ever come out!
But are you sure you don't want to visit me in my house?
zh: 但你确定不想来我家来看看我了吗？

en: Grandpa Pig and I will just have to eat my homemade cookies all by ourselves.
zh: 猪爷爷和我只好把我亲手做的饼干全吃掉了。

en: But, if you want to come in,you have to say the secret words.
zh: 但是，如果你想进来的话，你得说秘密暗号。
那很简单了！“爸爸的大肚子！”

en: Well, I still think that those are very silly secret words.
zh: 好吧，我仍然觉得那个秘密暗号很傻。
